title.rendered: Allidox– Allicin (Garlic) 30 Capsules Immunity Booster Natural Antibiotic

content.rendered:
• This supplement contains 100% stabilized Allicin, the active ingredient derived from garlic, known for its extensive health benefits. Allicin has been thoroughly researched, particularly by Dr. Peter Josling, the “Garlic Guru,” who has highlighted its impressive therapeutic properties. This potent compound may assist in managing various health conditions and promote overall well-being.

Key Benefits:

  • Support Healthy Cholesterol Levels: Allicin may help maintain optimal cholesterol levels, contributing to cardiovascular health.
  • Improve Digestion: Can improve gastrointestinal health and better digestion.
  • Boost Immune Function: Allidox helps Strengthen the body’s defense against cold and flu with its immune-boosting properties.
  • Regulate Blood Sugar: May help in maintaining healthy glucose levels.
  • Rich in Antioxidants: It may serve as a powerful antioxidant, neutralizing free radicals and protecting cells.
  • Helps Manage Allergies: It may provide relief from common allergic reactions.
  • Supports Skin and Foot Health: It may help address conditions such as athlete’s foot, chest infections, and wound healing.

Direction of use

  • Take 1 capsule daily with a meal for wellbeing.
  • Or as directed by your health care physician.
  • Daily intake must not exceed 4 capsules.
  • Women who are pregnant should check with their health provider before using.

Suitable for: Adults of 16 years and over

Ingredients: Active ingredients – Allicin Extract (garlic bulb) Also- Free from Maltodextrin, Free from Gum Acacia

Legal Disclaimer: This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure or prevent any disease.
